dsml_meetup_2025.title: DSML MEETUP 2025
dsml_meetup_2025.subtitle: The largest data science and machine learning conference in Kazakhstan
dsml_meetup_2025.description_1: Join us for the most anticipated data science event of the year! DSML MEETUP 2025 brings together leading experts, researchers, and practitioners from across Kazakhstan and beyond.
dsml_meetup_2025.description_2: This year's program features cutting-edge topics in machine learning, artificial intelligence, data engineering, and industry applications. Don't miss this opportunity to network with the community and learn from the best.
dsml_meetup_2025.speakers_note: Click on speaker photos to view their profiles

anuar_welcome.speaker: Anuar Aimoldin
anuar_welcome.abstract: Opening remarks, community achievements, and what's ahead for DSML Kazakhstan in 2025.

zhuldyzhan.speaker: Zhuldyz-Zhan Kairanbayev
zhuldyzhan.topic: Modern Approaches to Time Series Forecasting
zhuldyzhan.abstract: Exploring advanced techniques for time series analysis, from classical methods to modern deep learning approaches.

ayana.speaker: Ayana Kairanbayeva
ayana.topic: Ethics in AI: Building Responsible ML Systems
ayana.abstract: Discussion on ethical considerations in machine learning, bias detection, and building fair AI systems.

jimmy.speaker: Jimmy Yamazaki
jimmy.topic: MLOps in Production: Lessons from the Trenches
jimmy.abstract: Real-world experience in deploying and maintaining ML systems at scale, common pitfalls and best practices.

renat.speaker: Renat Alimbekov
renat.abstract: Practical applications of computer vision in various industries, from manufacturing to healthcare.

dulat.speaker: Dulat Atabek
dulat.abstract: Architecture patterns and tools for building robust, scalable data processing pipelines.

ivan.speaker: Ivan Degtev
ivan.topic: How to Feed an LLM to Make It Big and Smart
ivan.abstract: What do Yandex analysts do in the world of LLMs? Which tasks can really be 'thrown' data at, and which require a different approach? Why we don't believe in AI taking over humanity in the foreseeable future, but are confident in its business value today? Let's talk about where the hype ends and real value begins.

anuar_delivery.speaker: Anuar Aimoldin
anuar_delivery.topic: The Future of Data Science in Kazakhstan
anuar_delivery.abstract: Closing keynote on the evolution of data science landscape in Kazakhstan and future opportunities.
